Posts.Title: Really need to hear optimistic stories Dorit dianemom2

Posts.Content: Dorit wrote: I'm a new stage 4, just had a surgery at L 3 to take out the only tumor. I refuse a following radiotherapy (just to make sure it want develop again) I like to believe that raw food, meditation and supplements will gain time. Really need to hear optimistic stories, about women that heard about there stage 4 long time ago, and still ok. Also I would like to read some stories about one metastasis at L4 and the flow of the illness after that. Dorit Dx 4/2007, IDC, 2cm, Stage IV, 5/14 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Really need to hear optimistic stories Dorit dianemom2
